response.overview: Real cage fights for poontang. Mixed martial arts series in which male performers compete in the cage, no stuntmen here, for a carnal prize. All full-contact bouts are two three-minute rounds with a round each for grappling and kickboxing. Winner get's the prize, loser takes the punishment. Two more action packed bouts & hardcore XXX action in this big budget reality based series. Battle Bang is assured to bring a whole new fan base to the MMA community.
response.title: Battle Bang 2
